title: Somebody already took the name "Jhin Bot"? :(
body: Since no one is playing on that account... I WANT IT

replies.body:
Looks like you'll have to be patient and wait 134 days until the name becomes available due to inactivity. I did it for my name, it's a good feeling when you finally change it :D

https://i.gyazo.com/9e5177c5a1898f68be3e20fc5167fe28.png
That's good, I'll happily wait until I become a Jhin only main!

whenever i see jhin i think jhingle bells.
yea i'm wierd
